com.nutiteq.vectorelements

Class BalloonPopup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nutiteq.vectorelements.VectorElement
      • com.nutiteq.vectorelements.Billboard
        • com.nutiteq.vectorelements.Popup
          • com.nutiteq.vectorelements.BalloonPopup

  • public class BalloonPopup
extends Popup
    Simple text-based map popup containing title and optional description.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BalloonPopup

        public BalloonPopup(Geometry geometry,
            BalloonPopupStyle style,
            java.lang.String title,
            java.lang.String description)
        Constructs a BalloonPopup object with the specified style and attaches it to a billboard element. If an empty string is passed for the title, it will not be drawn. The same applies to the description.
        Parameters:
        baseBillboard - The billboard this balloon popup will be attached to.
        style - The style that defines what this balloon popup looks like.
        title - The text this balloon popup will display.
        description - The description this balloon popup will display.

      • BalloonPopup

        public BalloonPopup(Billboard baseBillboard,
            BalloonPopupStyle style,
            java.lang.String title,
            java.lang.String description)
        Constructs a BalloonPopup object from a geometry object and a style. If an empty string is passed for the title, it will not be drawn. The same applies to the description.
        Parameters:
        geometry - The geometry object that defines the location of this balloon popup.
        style - The style that defines what this balloon popup looks like.
        title - The text this balloon popup will display.
        description - The description this balloon popup will display.

      • BalloonPopup

        public BalloonPopup(MapPos pos,
            BalloonPopupStyle style,
            java.lang.String title,
            java.lang.String description)
        Constructs a BalloonPopup object from a map position and a style. If an empty string is passed for the title, it will not be drawn. The same applies to the description.
        Parameters:
        poses - The map position that defines the location of this balloon popup.
        style - The style that defines what this balloon popup looks like.
        title - The text this balloon popup will display.
        description - The description this balloon popup will display.

    • Method Detail

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Returns the title of this balloon popup.
        Returns:
        The title of this balloon popup.

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Sets the title this balloon popup will display. If an empty string is passed the title will not be drawn.
        Parameters:
        title - The new title this balloon popup will display.

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns the description of this balloon popup.

      • setDescription

        public void setDescription(java.lang.String desc)
        Sets the description this balloon popup will display. If an empty string is passed the description will not be drawn.
        Parameters:
        description - The new description this balloon popup will display.

      • drawBitmap

        public Bitmap drawBitmap(ScreenPos anchorScreenPos,
                float screenWidth,
                float screenHeight,
                float dpToPX)
        Description copied from class: Popup
        Draws a custom bitmap for this Popup that will be used for drawing the Popup on the map.
        The method is called each time the Popup gets reloaded internally.
        Overrides:
        drawBitmap in class Popup
        Parameters:
        anchorScreenPos - The screen position of the anchor point of this popup in pixels.
        screenWidth - The current screen width in pixels.
        screenHeight - The current screen height in pixels.
        dpToPX - The value used for converting display independent pixels (dp) to pixels (px).
        Returns:
        The custom Popup bitmap.
